name: Yōkai
description:
Yōkai is a game specially designed for the Seven Day Roguelike Challenge.

It´s a modular abstract, print, cut and play game

http://7drl.org

This game is inspired by “Hive” by John Yianni, “Zaga 33” by Michael Brough and the Hnefatafl board game.

http://7drl.org/2014/03/16/yokai-success/
